entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Earlton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 p.m. EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.5Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
